about_the_game:
This DLC is a donation intended for those who wish to provide additional support to the developer of Snail Trek. It contains no gameplay changes or additional content, except:

  • it permits the main character to outfit themselves in moving rainbow colors!
  • it adds a secret option to the snails' computer thanking the player (who was the first cosmollusconaut) for their patronage.

You can turn on and off the rainbow suit at any time in the Options dialog.
detailed_description:
This DLC is a donation intended for those who wish to provide additional support to the developer of Snail Trek. It contains no gameplay changes or additional content, except:

  • it permits the main character to outfit themselves in moving rainbow colors!
  • it adds a secret option to the snails' computer thanking the player (who was the first cosmollusconaut) for their patronage.

You can turn on and off the rainbow suit at any time in the Options dialog.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP SP2
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 3000 or better

  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Support the developer so they can make more games like Snail Trek! And sport a beautiful rainbow skin while you're at it.
